title: Intertextuality-Based Business Writing Competency Enhancement Course in Multicultural Settings

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Writing Skills and Experience in Preparing Workplace Reports
context.additional_context: Environment where learners from diverse cultural backgrounds must acquire practical writing skills in a short period using mobile devices; conducted via BYOD with summative assessments measuring learning outcomes

learning_goals: Learners can compose business documents reflecting diverse cultural perspectives using intertextuality strategies.
Learners distinguish at least three context-appropriate writing strategies by connecting existing texts with new information.
Learners develop an action plan to apply learned writing skills to two or more specific cases in future work environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
